trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies a certificate used by a service to identify itself.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，指定服务用于标识自身的证书。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: from is .
trans-unit.target: fromis .

trans-unit.source: The configuration file is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定要在 X.509 证书存储区中搜索的值。

trans-unit.source: The type contained in this property must satisfy the requirements of the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement.X509FindType%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性中包含的类型必须满足的要求指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement.X509FindType%2A>值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement.X509FindType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 要在 X.509 证书存储区中搜索的值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the location of the certificate store the client can use to validate the server’s certificate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定可以用于验证服务器的证书客户端的证书存储区位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"></xref> that specifies the location of the certificate store the client can use to validate the server’s certificate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"> </xref>指定客户端可用于验证服务器的证书的证书存储区位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要打开的 X.509 证书存储区的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"></xref> that contains the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"> </xref> ，其中包含要打开的 X.509 证书存储区的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要执行的 X.509 搜索的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement.FindValue%2A> must satisfy the requirements of this property.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的类型<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement.FindValue%2A>必须满足此属性的要求。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateServiceElement.FindValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> that specifies the type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> ，指定要执行的 X.509 搜索的类型。
